title: Portrait collecting...looking for a centered Lajoie, Waddell, Walsh
author: njdunkin1

posts.post_title: Portrait collecting...looking for a centered Lajoie, Waddell, Walsh
posts.post_content:
Hey everyone! I am hoping to pick up some portraits from here on Net54. Lower condition/ungraded/SGC graded preferred but will look at PSA, BVG as well. Any back is fine :) I will bump this each time I have cash available for 3-5 cards at a time. There are quite a few here, and as a young man saving for college, I don't have the kind of money to buy them all in one stroke :D However, that doesn't mean I won't be interested if you piece together a small lot for me. Main interests are in the following order: SLers, HOFers, Commons...but I would be happy to look at any of the cards listed. Please let me know if you have a few!
Email: [url]njdunkin1@gmail.com[/url]
Current budget: +/- 95.00
REFERENCE:
(x): identifies that I already possess said card.
(ix): card is incoming and has been recently purchased
(!): high on the want list
(!!!): highest on the want list :)

Here we go!

I have a William O'Neil low grade/beater if that's what you're going for.

Sure thing! I'll send over for pics and price. Thanks :)
Thanks for the deals everyone! Some new cards picked up, will post when they come in. List /budget adjusted.
June 6th bump, picked up a few more!
Dunkin, I sent you several scans and pics but never heard back from you. Whats up?

[quote name="Stetson_1883" post=1547318]Dunkin, I sent you several scans and pics but never heard back from you. Whats up?[/QUOTE]

I'll re-check my inbox and get back to you. My apologies!
Okay, budget back up at 100. Looking for Hall of Famers and Southern Leaguers right now. Any today?

PMs responded to....huge card purchased today, very excited for when it comes in!
NJ
Fantastic Tuesday night bump! Thank you to all who have lent a hand so far!

Got a Bender coming in, have an E. Collins and Shag in hand. Thank you Sean, Investinbaseball, and others! List updated accordingly.
Ty!
NJ D.
Picked up a few big cards, new needs updated. Looking for a centered Waddell above all!
Waddell, Walsh, or a Merkle today?
